events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but it doesn’t fit at all. I want to return it and get a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's message indicates a request for refund due to sizing issues, categorizing the case under Refund.
The case has been assigned to the refund processing department to handle the return and refund request.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you want to return the jacket and get a refund. I’m here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in original condition for return eligibility?
Sure, the order number is 123456789. The jacket is brand new, I haven’t worn it outside and it’s still in original packaging.
Thank you for the info. We have initiated your refund process and you should receive the money back in 5-7 business days after returning the jacket.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I feel reassured knowing the refund is on its way.
The refund case has been resolved successfully. Please send us the tracking number once you ship the jacket back.
Just following up to confirm if you have shipped the jacket back and received the refund without issues.
I shipped it yesterday and received the refund today. Everything was handled very professionally, thank you!
We are glad your refund was processed successfully. Closing this case now. Please contact us anytime for further assistance.
We would appreciate if you could take a moment to complete a satisfaction survey about your refund experience.
